overview:
Uzair is passionate about GAMES Development.

He is a strong believer in working hard and producing results. Having worked in teams of all sizes has realized his potential of being a team player. Possess strong leadership qualities that has helped in training, mentoring and motivating teams. Driving their productive figures to meet work targets.

Uzairâ€™s biggest strength is the fact that he has his head and heart in the right place, which is what, sets him apart. He is organized, has a lot of integrity and above all else, that crucial quality that every budding entrepreneur must have: a passion for creating something.

Setting up Emblem posed a lot of difficulties, but I see that because of his single minded determination & focus he is gradually turning this project into an intellectually profitable & rewarding enterprise. A reward that he fully well deserves!
